alert.note: Alert for Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 4:18PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Minnesota, including the following counties, Clay and Wilkin. * WHEN...Until 400 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 415 PM CDT, emergency management reported overland flooding from snow melt. Snowmelt of lingering snowpack is expected and this will lead to additional overland flooding through next week. - Ongoing snowmelt will continue to lead to widespread flooding impacts throughout the week. This may include road closures, washouts, and other snowmelt related flooding impacts. Precipitation may exacerbate these impacts.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
